title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 203.25 - Crematory operator course auditing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 203.25 - Crematory operator course auditing

State Regulations
A duly authorized representative of the Division of

Cemeteries may audit any course offered, and may verify attendance and inspect
the records of attendance of the course at any time during its presentation or
thereafter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
203.25

Renumbered from 204.11

New

York State Register August 7, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 32, eff. 8/7/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
